message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: An Approval Check already exists for this type of plan item.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_SELECT_EITHER_APPLIES_TO_ALL_OR_ACTIVE_TYPE
message.locale: This approval check is already active.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_PERCENTAGE_NOT_IN_RANGE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_TYPE_ACTIVE
message.locale: This approval check is already active.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_SELECT_PLANITEM
message.locale: Plan item name must be specified if applies to all plan items has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_SELECT_APPLIESTOALLIND
message.locale: As this approval check applies to all plan items you must not select an individual plan item name.

message.name: ERR_PLANITEM_RV_CANCELLED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Approval check cannot be modified as the plan item is canceled.
Approval check cannot be modified as the plan item is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_PLANITEM_CANCELED
message.locale: This plan item has already been cancelled. An approval check cannot be created or modified for a cancelled plan item.
This plan item has already been canceled. An approval check cannot be created or modified for a canceled plan item.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: Plan item approval check is already cancelled.
Plan item approval check is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_RV_CANCELED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Approval Check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.
Approval Check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
